documentation.text:
@dev Interface of the ERC20 standard
 This interface contract defines fuctions and events required to meet the ERC20 standard.

@dev returns the total amount of tokens in existence right now, minus any tokens
 that have been burned.
@dev returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.
@dev returns the number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.
@dev transfer `tokens` tokens from `owner` account to `to` account.
@dev allow `spender` to withdraw `tokens` tokens from the `caller` account.
@dev emitted when `tokens` tokens are transfered from `from`to `to`.
@dev emitted when `owner` set the allowance of `spender` to `tokens`.

@dev Interface of the ERC20 standard
 This interface contract defines fuctions and events required to meet the ERC20 standard.

@dev returns the total amount of tokens in existence right now, minus any tokens
 that have been burned.
@dev returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.
@dev returns the number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.
@dev transfer `tokens` tokens from `owner` account to `to` account.
@dev allow `spender` to withdraw `tokens` tokens from the `caller` account.
@dev emitted when `tokens` tokens are transfered from `from`to `to`.
@dev emitted when `owner` set the allowance of `spender` to `tokens`.

devdoc.details: Interface of the ERC20 standard This interface contract defines fuctions and events required to meet the ERC20 standard.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: emitted when `owner` set the allowance of `spender` to `tokens`.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: emitted when `tokens` tokens are transfered from `from`to `to`.

allowance(address,address).details: returns the number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

approve(address,uint256).details: allow `spender` to withdraw `tokens` tokens from the `caller` account.

balanceOf(address).details: returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

totalSupply().details: returns the total amount of tokens in existence right now, minus any tokens that have been burned.

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer `tokens` tokens from `owner` account to `to` account.
